title: ninnu sEvincina
sahitya:
ninnu sEvincina janulaku nika E janara bAdhalu galavE


anupallavi

  kanakAngi shrI rukmiNi hrdayAbja dinamaNE pArthasArathi svAmi
				(svara sAhitya)
rArA ninnu sadA (kOriti vinu) kOritini manavi vinumu 
sArasa daLAkSa sharaNAgata janAvana krpAnidhivi


caraNam    bhava sAgara tArakamai yunnadi nI pada sarasa yugamamu 
bhuvi mAnava lOkulaku bhukti mukti pradamu (nI padamu) 
bhava sannuta nIdu nAma bhajana sadA jEyucunna
kavi janAvana lOla nI sari galadA delpu kumAra pUjita pAdA
